pkgmetadata.longdescription: The L-Logistic Bayesian Regression // R functions and data sets for the work Paz, R.F., Balakrishnan, N and Bazn, J.L. (2018). L-logistic regression models: Prior sensitivity analysis, robustness to outliers and applications. Brazilian Journal of Probability and Statistics, https://www.imstat.org/wp- content/uploads/2018/05/BJPS397.pdf.
